name: Run_From_The_Wannacry
description:
In a world filled with viruses and hackers, you are the only one who can sav...... wait. No, it's just a game, go play it.

W-A-S-D to move around.

L-SHIFT to stop.

SPACEBAR to warp.

ESCAPE to go back to the menu.

Soundtrack by :

EricSkiff.com

IF THERE ARE ANY PROBLEMS PLEASE FEEL FREE TO TELL ME.
